metadata.title: CVE-2019-19907 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: HrAddFBBlock in libfreebusy/freebusyutil.cpp in Kopano Groupware Core before 8.7.7 allows out-of-bounds access, as demonstrated by mishandling of an array copy during parsing of ICal data.

criterions.comment: kopanocore package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.7.0-6ubuntu1').
